prompt: Build a minimalist privacy policy page with a clean white background and elegant typography. Feature a simple black 'Privacy Policy' title aligned to the left with minimal font weight. Include a brief subtitle in lighter gray text explaining the last update date. Structure the content using a numbered list format with large, bold numbers (1, 2, 3, 4) in blue color, followed by section titles and concise bullet points. Each numbered section should cover 'Collection', 'Usage', 'Storage', and 'Rights' respectively. At the bottom, place a single centered toggle switch labeled 'I accept the terms' with subtle animations. Keep generous white space throughout for a clean, uncluttered appearance.
